A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It's OK. It's more than OK. It's as exciting as a theme park ride but with more twists and turns than a regular roller coaster. Is that what a Pirates of the Caribbean ride ara Disney park is like?
Watching the movie itself was not unlike an experience of watching an outrageous Bollywood epic. However\, in the theatre i was in\, the only scene in which the audience whooped and cheered and laughed together was that brushing dust off the shoulder scene. Otherwise it was pretty muted. Tough crowd\, but they sure loved the hammed up pantomime like scenes.

Perhaps\, the entire story and plotline itself is pretty grim.
